Articles.Content:
I never got to make one of these "I'm new here" announcements when I joined, cause I didn't know about it.

Well, a lot of you have probably seen me around, and maybe have seen one or more of my 1,999 posts before now.

This post is my 2000th post on this wonderful forum for this wonderful game. I'm happy to have been here through different updates and such.

So, 2,000 post belated welcome aboard, me!
Oi, hey, hands off the cookies. Those are for the new guys!

Welcome, Endersmens! I'm glad you are already aboard.

Happy landings!
Reminds me, I never released a special craft pack for my 2000th post..
